RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 16, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEN TWENTY NINE settled back early, rallied, driving. UNION BROTHER stalked three wide, rallied for the place. QUICK ENTRY set pace, weakened late. TOMMY TUESDAY showed early speed, tired. VOLTE FACE mild bid, evenly. COLONEL MIKE wide trip. HOLY TRUTH tired. OUT FOR JUSTICE gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Tuesday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R

ENTRY.NAME: Volte Face
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P and Carlino David

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In El igibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PANGEA steadied early, rallied, driving. IRON WILMA settled back early, rallied, second best. MAYSVILLE MISS led, weakened late. NELL'S BELLS trailed, mild bid. HUMMIN' THE FUNK bid, tired. GRAND VENUS brief speed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLLYWOOD PRINCE dueled two wide, driving. ROGERS GINGER well held, moved three wide for bid, second best. PERFECT SPLIT dueled, weakened. VASY SAYS NYET three wide, lacked bid. SIXTYFOUR G T O no factor. MISSED THE CALL outrun. REZ RUNNER outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 12400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUESTION AUTHORITY stalked the early pace, driving. BROTHER SKYE dueled early, second best. GOTTAGETITBACK settled, rallied five wide. HPNOTIQ RHYTHM up close early, dropped back, mild bid. ESTILO VARONIL dueled, tired. DRIVE BY LAYOVER no threat. DONNELS CREEK tired. CATES SWOOSH trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Hpnotiq Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close early, dropped back, mild bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KOSHER COWBOY rushed to the lead, widened, won ridden out. OX DOC settled behind leaders, rallied, second best. CATFISH back early, late rally. GUN FACTOR dueled early, tired. EXECUTIVE PRIZE wide trip, outrun. SHOSHA no threat. CRACK THE MOON showed brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Kosher Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: Rushed to lead, widened, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-Winners Of A Race Since April !6 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claimi ng Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST IMPRESSION dueled three wide, drifted late, driving. FLOWZANO broke a step slow, traffic early, rallied between horses, was bothered late. DEL MAR FLASH steadied early, came wide for the stretch, was bothered late. TALK DIRTY made a good middle move, tired late. AMERICAN BOUND dueled early, tired late. CASSIE'S RAINBOW showed early speed, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Flowzano
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke a step slow, traffic early, rallied between, bothered late

ENTRY.NAME: Del Mar Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early, came wide, bothered late

ENTRY.NAME: First Impression
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled three wide, drifted late, driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Spruce Lane, Built Wright, Lynn Farm,Will Robbins, Copper

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Purse 28600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Races Not Considered) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENERGIZER dueled from the outset, driving. JOHN'S ROCK lagged back early, rallied wide, just missed. WILLISTON WAY dueled with the winner, held show. BAYTOWN BEAR saved ground, lacked late bid. SHY GUY back early, no threat. IRISH UNITY showed early speed, tired. LIKEABLE gave way early.

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, rallied wide, just missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTIVATING ART up close, won driving. CURIOSITY KILLS settled off pace, rallied late. BET THE QUEEN rallied. MISS NUCKOLS dueled, weakened. SEA MONSTER tired. NURSE KATIE no factor. ESTA CALIENTE outrun.
